topic.title: ZeroNet Tracker ?
topic.body:
I just saw that there is now a tracker field.
Is that the bootstrapper plugin ? Or any recent new change ?

Can I host my own tracker ?

1528032819_1HeCQMqcYxJugdjGVt3rS5hzxVyZY.body:
> [nofish](#comment_1165_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj):You can host your own tracker by enabling the Bootstrapper plugin and adding your address to other client's Config.py file.

I did this, but I cant find the config.py file. Is ther absolutely no documentation on this ?? Seriously ?
